alert.note: Alert for McLean; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:26PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN MCLEAN AND NORTHEASTERN OLIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM CDT... At 826 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Underwood, or 10 miles northwest of Washburn, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Washburn around 840 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
